WorkItem.Description:
When I ran the command to create the PDF, it gives me the error: "Unable to retrieve graphic from HCFA1500_Red.gif".

I don't think it is looking for the image files in the same directory as the EXEs, by default.

When I write code to do this and pass the exact location of the GIFs, it works fine.
WorkItem.Summary: Unable to retrieve graphic from HCFA1500_Red.gif
